recommendations.description: List of extensions which should be recommended for users of this workspace. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'vscode.csharp'.

unwantedRecommendations.description: List of extensions recommended by VS Code that should not be recommended for users of this workspace. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'vscode.csharp'.
